name: Meloon Wardragon
description: A famous human adventurer and local hero, known for his grand personality and membership in the prestigious Force Grey. He is cheerful, boisterous, and always ready for a fight or a flagon of ale.
ideals: Glory: 'A great deed deserves a great song!'
Strength: 'My power is a shield for those who have none.'
Friendship: 'What's a victory without friends to share it with?'
bonds: His reputation as one of Waterdeep's greatest heroes.
flaws: Can be reckless, trusting his strength to see him through.
Has a weakness for strong ale and pretty faces.
motivations: To seek out adventure and test his mettle.
To protect Waterdeep from all who would harm it.
To live a life worthy of the stories told about him.

canned_conversations.greeting: (He raises his mug with a wide grin) Hail, adventurers! Heroes, am I right? Maybe one day you'll join Force Grey. Can I buy you an ale?
canned_conversations.ask_about_his_adventures: Just back from the Rat Hills, cleared out a whole nest of wererats! Nasty business, but the ale tastes all the better for it!
canned_conversations.ask_about_force_grey: The finest fighting force in the city! When the Watch can't handle it, they call us. It's an honor to serve.
